The Darts team are looking to thrive off the York home support in their attempt to secure the points for the White Rose

After the men's glorious victory over the Red Rose at last year's tournament, both the men's and women's basketball teams return to Roses rejuvenated, looking to win all eight points on offer

York are usually the dominant force in the pool at Roses, expect no less this year. The White Rose are tipped to take all 16 points on offer

Sailing has been a reliable source of points for York for the past three Roses but, with the seconds fixtures now worth points, Lancaster are sure to give the YUSWC a tough time

Roses 2015 Preview: Futsal

The University of York Futsal Club are force to be reckoned with in both league and cup, and it will take a massive upset for Lancaster to emerge with a result in the inaugural Roses fixture in this sport.

The University of York's Trampolining Club will be hoping for victory in what promises to be a close fought showdown with Lancaster

In a match cut short by injuries, York Raiders, the University's new Rugby League club, faded towards the end of the match after a promising first quarter

Roses 2015 Preview: Rugby League

The fixture will be the Raiders' second ever match, and their first gave them reason to think that they can be competitive against the Lancaster Lynx

Roses 2015 Preview: Fencing

Based on past performances, the Men's firsts could go either way. The men's seconds and the women will need to win to be sure of a victory for York

Roses 2015 Preview: Squash

Promotion and loss of players meant the men's team struggled this year, in contrast to solid form in the league and cup from the women's team. History favours the White Rose, and that should continue this year.

Roses 2015 Preview: Lacrosse

It has been another successful year for one of York's powerhouse clubs, as both men's and women's sides have packed a punch after promotion. Expect the Black and Gold to pick up 12 points here.
